commented_code:
- master
 
 jobs:
+  golangci-lint:
+    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
+    continue-on-error: true
+    steps:
+      - name: Setup go
+        uses: actions/setup-go@v2
+        with:
+          go-version: '^1.16'
+      - name: Checkout repository
+        uses: actions/checkout@v2
+      - name: Setup golangci-lint
+        uses: golangci/golangci-lint-action@v2
+        with:
+          version: latest

discussion_comments.comment_body:
Don't use the `latest` version. Please define the specific version `v1.41.1`.

```yml
      with:
        args: --verbose
        version: v1.41.1
```

discussion_comments.commented_code:
@@ -9,6 +9,20 @@ on:
       - master
 
 jobs:
+  golangci-lint:
+    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
+    continue-on-error: true
+    steps:
+      - name: Setup go
+        uses: actions/setup-go@v2
+        with:
+          go-version: '^1.16'
+      - name: Checkout repository
+        uses: actions/checkout@v2
+      - name: Setup golangci-lint
+        uses: golangci/golangci-lint-action@v2
+        with:

commented_code:
+name: Run Tests
+
+on:
+  push:
+    branches:
+      - master
+  pull_request:
+    branches:
+      - master
+
+jobs:
+  test:
+    strategy:
+      matrix:
+        os: [ubuntu-latest, macos-latest, windows-latest]
+        go: [1.12, 1.13, 1.14, 1.15]

discussion_comments.commented_code:
@@ -0,0 +1,62 @@
+name: Run Tests
+
+on:
+  push:
+    branches:
+      - master
+  pull_request:
+    branches:
+      - master
+
+jobs:
+  test:
+    strategy:
+      matrix:
+        os: [ubuntu-latest, macos-latest, windows-latest]
+        go: [1.12, 1.13, 1.14, 1.15]
